items.title: Hundreds arrested in third night of Turkey protests
items.description: Police arrested Istanbul's mayor, a key opposition figure, on Wednesday, sparking protests.

items.title: Israel strikes Lebanon after first rocket attack since ceasefire
items.description: Benjamin Netanyahu has promised "to act forcefully" after the rocket attack into northern Israel.

items.title: Why Trump is struggling to secure fast ceasefire in Ukraine
items.description: Trump said he would end the war in Ukraine in 24 hours. The reality is proving far more difficult.

items.title: Trump revokes security clearance for Harris, Clinton and others
items.description: The US president also confirmed he was revoking the security clearance of Joe Biden and "any other member" of the Biden family.

items.title: Heavyweight boxing legend George Foreman dies aged 76
items.description: Foreman won his first world heavyweight championship in 1973 and lost it a year later to Muhammad Ali in the famous Rumble in the Jungle fight.
